name: Rock N' Roll (Shadow The Dragon)
description:
MADE FOR GMTK 2022 - MADE WITHIN 48 HOURS

You are a die (singular dice) who's mission in life is to get back his stolen collectable gold coins, which ended up being taken by the rocks (who didn't even know what they took).  Get back your collectables and avoid being crushed by the rocks (who really aren't even trying are they?) as you play Rock N Roll.

Dev Note: Main Menu isn't the prettiest, but I'm overall proud of the final game. Feel like it's a major step up from my games for previous jams.  There may be some bugs, as again made within 48 hours and me being urged to actually sleep like a normal person, but it should hopefully be enjoyable!

Credits for Externally Used Assets:
Sound: Freesound.org (All Creative Commons 0)
Music: Something I Like (instrumental) – RYYZN (No Copyright Music)
